data.question: What is the empirical formula of [Cu2Br2(AsPh3)2(prz)]n measured at 25 °C?
At what temperature were the photophysical properties of [Cu2Br2(AsPh3)2(prz)]n measured?
What is the crystal system of [Cu2I2(AsPh3)2(bpy)]n?
Does [Cu2Br2(AsPh3)2(nap)]n have a higher quantum yield at 298 K or 77 K?
Is the emission color of [Cu2I2(AsPh3)2(meprz)]n in the green-to-red region?
What is the excitation maximum (λex) of [Cu2Br2(AsPh3)2(dimeprz)]n at 298 K?
What is the emission lifetime (τ) of [Cu2I2(AsPh3)2(pym)]n at 77 K?
Is the Cu···Cu distance in [Cu2Br2(AsPh3)2(prz)]n shorter at -180 °C compared to 25 °C?
What is the effect of grinding on the emission color of [Cu2Br2(AsPh3)2(prz)]n?
data.answer: Negligible changes were observed in their emission colors after grinding.

data.question: Does the structure of [Cu2I2(AsPh3)2(bpy)]n remain the same before and after grinding?
What is the coordination polymer backbone's role in the emission efficiency of [Cu2Br2(AsPh3)2(dimeprz)]n?
data.answer: The robust 1D-coordination polymer backbone restricts molecular motions, promoting non-radiative deactivation of the excitons.

data.question: Is the emission of [Cu2I2(AsPh3)2(meprz)]n more efficient at 298 K or 77 K?
Are the photophysical properties of [Cu2Br2(AsPh3)2(nap)]n measured in a crystalline state?
What is the role of the bidentate N-heteroaromatic co-ligands in the emission color of the coordination polymers?
data.answer: The emission color is dependent on the N-heteroaromatic co-ligand used.

data.question: Does the emission color of [Cu2I2(AsPh3)2(pym)]n change significantly after grinding?
What is the quantum yield (Φ) of [Cu2Br2(AsPh3)2(bpy)]n at 298 K?
Is the emission of [Cu2I2(AsPh3)2(dimeprz)]n attributed to phosphorescence or TADF?
data.answer: The emissions are attributed to phosphorescence or TADF.

data.question: Are the structures of the CuX complexes analyzed by X-ray crystallography?
What is the effect of the arsenic ligand on the luminescence properties of the complexes?
data.answer: Arsenic ligands significantly change the luminescence properties due to their higher spin–orbit coupling parameter.

data.question: Is the emission color of [Cu2Br2(AsPh3)2(meprz)]n stable under mechanical stimuli?
